name: .LXE File Extension
summary: Learn about .LXE files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can only open LXE files with Foundry Modo by selecting File → Open.... To set the LXE file to automatically appear in the Preset Browser in Modo, place the LXE file in the Luxology\​Content\​Assets directory.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
